name: Hankook Tire & Technology Co., Ltd.
description: Hankook Tire & Technology Co., Ltd. is a leading global tire manufacturer headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. Established in 1941, Hankook has grown to become one of the largest tire manufacturers in the world, specializing in the production of high-quality tires for passenger cars, trucks, buses, and motorsport vehicles. With a commitment to innovation and sustainability, Hankook invests heavily in research and development to create advanced tire technologies that enhance performance, safety, and fuel efficiency. The company's product portfolio includes a wide range of tires such as the Ventus line for high-performance vehicles, the Kinergy line for optimal comfort and longevity, and the Dynapro series for SUVs and trucks. Hankook is dedicated to environmental responsibility and actively works towards reducing the ecological impact of its manufacturing processes. The company has established a strong global presence, with production facilities in South Korea, Hungary, China, and the United States, and a distribution network that spans over 180 countries. Hankook's mission is to provide exceptional products that meet the diverse needs of consumers while continuously striving for innovation and sustainability in the tire industry.
